training_arguments.prompt_template:
Analyze the sentiment of the following text and classify it as to only one of the following: [positive, negative, neutral]. Return only the label from the given set [positive, negative, neutral]. You are not allowed to answer '___'. Empty answer is not allowed. Below I give you some examples:
Text: "The GeoSolutions technology will leverage Benefon 's GPS solutions by providing Location Based Search Technology , a Communities Platform , location relevant multimedia content and a new and powerful commercial model ."
Sentiment: negative
Text: "Circulation revenue has increased by 5 % in Finland and 4 % in Sweden in 2008 ."
Sentiment: positive
Text: "Elcoteq SE is listed on the Nasdaq OMX Helsinki Ltd. ."
Sentiment: neutral
Text: "Today I bought more $MU $YHOO $VALE $NBL $TWTR $AXP $ZNGA https://t.co/Vt6T5Zp2is"
Sentiment: positive
Text: "$BBRY both 1m/6m trends turn bullish today with a resistance level at $11.31. http://stks.co/j1qt"
Sentiment: positive

Text: "{text_to_analyze}"
Sentiment:
